author: wn.com
title: PES President welcomes first steps towards child guarantee (PES - Party of European Socialists)
text: ( Source : PES - Party of European Socialists ) Sergei Stanishev , President of the Party of European Socialists (PES) welcomed a report drafted by the European Parliament's Employment committee calling for a special fund - a child guarantee -
